column1: The organization guarantees that the funds the user has put in its custody will not be lost in case of bankruptcy of itself or of a third party to whom it has delegated the custody of the funds. the organization guarantees that the funds the user has put in its custody will not be lost in case of bankruptcy of itself or of a third party to whom it has delegated the custody of the funds.
This contract is subject to french law.
If a part of this contract is nullified, that judgment does not nullify the rest of the agreement. if a part of this contract is nullified, that judgment does not nullify the rest of the agreement.

The organization does not implicitly commit to anything, in particular it does not guarantee that the service will be operational at all times without interruptions the organization does not implicitly commit to anything, in particular it does not guarantee that the service will be operational at all times without interruptions the organization cannot be held responsible for the consequences of negligence by the user, notably of failure by the user to secure their password.

The user commits to use the service in good faith, in particular the user commits not to lie about their identity and not to fill their profile in a deceptive way for the purpose of attracting more donations. the user commits to use the service in good faith, in particular the user commits not to lie about their identity and not to fill their profile in a deceptive way for the purpose of attracting more donations.
The user acknowledges that cookies are necessary for the service to function and agrees to their use.
The organization cannot be held responsible for the consequences of negligence by the user, notably of failure by the user to secure their password.
Any dispute shall be submitted to the competent french jurisdiction.
It undertakes to inform the user of any changes.
The organization does not guarantee that the user will be able to withdraw the money in its account without delay.

The service normally allows the user to increase the visibility of its profile in various way, but the organization reserves the right to disable the user's access to those features. the service normally allows the user to increase the visibility of its profile in various way, but the organization reserves the right to disable the user's access to those features.
The user can quit the service by closing their account.
The organization may modify this contract at any time.
The organization may close the user's account if it considers that they have violated this contract, or a contract with a partner of the organization, or any applicable law.
Any dispute shall be submitted to the competent french jurisdiction. this contract is subject to french law.
In particular, the organization may impose a delay to deter and protect itself from fraud.
